sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch and Japan increase slightly with steady steps between 2010 and 2017; while India keep stable between 2010 and 2017.
Japan has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016 and 2017.
There is an unusual drop in 2012 of Japan.

sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch and Japan increase slightly with steady steps between 2010 and 2017; while India keep stable between 2010 and 2017.
Japan has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016 and 2017.
There is an unusual drop in 2012 of Japan.
